Join the new Head Hunters PvP Event! It's time for the city's traditional headshot tournament: Head Hunters! Land Headshots on PvP matches to be the Headshot Champion.
Join the new Head Hunters PvP Event! It's time for the city's traditional headshot tournament: Head Hunters! Land Headshots on PvP matches to be the Headshot Champion.
Play our newest PvE event and take part in the Winter Ops for a chance to get a brand new gear set! The event and new gear are going live on December 24th, stay tuned.

Christmas is here! 
- Join the new event Winter Ops to save Christmas!
- Awesome rewards during the event
- New special gear: Winter Soldier
- Gear and Avatar updates

- Gear and Avatar updates

+ Play through all the 21 cities in Single Player mode
+ Advance through the new Leagues in the Real-Time Multiplayer PvP Arena
+ Battle against others in the Squad Wars

The year of the Ox is here, and along with it a series of events to celebrate the Lunar New Year! Starting on February 12 Lunar events will be happening every weekend until March 7th, with exclusive rewards, and a new gear set, the Lunar Ox. Each weekend will reward a different gear piece, we will share the reward list in a few days, stay tuned!

The year of the Ox is here, and along with it a series of events to celebrate the Lunar New Year! Starting on February 12 Lunar events will be happening every weekend until March 7th, with exclusive rewards, and a new gear set, the Lunar Ox. Each weekend will reward a different gear piece, we will share the reward list in a few days, stay tuned!

Our newest patch containing our newest feature is now live! 
This version contains the following: 
- Multiple bug fixes 
- Beta Squad Wars

- Bug Fixes
- Stability improvements

+ Play through all the 21 cities in Single Player mode
+ Advance through the new Leagues in the Real-Time Multiplayer PvP Arena
+ Battle against others in the Squad Wars
- New tier 26 weapon, Glacier
- Bug Fixes
- Bug Fixes

This patch contains multiple fixes; most importantly, NOW you will be able to see the following as implemented in the game:
  
- Metal Ox new Tier 26 Sniper Rifle
- Master Collector achievement is now fixed 
- Perfect Attendance achievement is now also fixed 
- Progressive Discount Chain will be displaying the correct prices 
- Your 6th Discount Purchase Chain will always be delivered 
- WOPS Red Skulls won’t be reset to 0 after the game it’s closed

The patch also contains the following enhancements: 

- Halloween references have now been removed from the Zombie Nightmare Events 
- Zombie Nightmare will have new visual cards displaying the current/upcoming Events 
- There will be an easier layout all-together of the Events menu

- Bug Fixes
- Stability improvements

- Bug Fixes
- Stability improvements

- Bug Fixes
- Stability improvements
- Bug Fixes

This patch contains multiple fixes and enhancements:
- Black Ops achievement is now fixed 
- Striking Out achievement is now also fixed 
- Sunday Gear Box rewards for players with full Gear Sets are now added
- Blank screen issue resolved, when submitting player support tickets
